name: MVP feature priority matrix
description:
Creating a minimum viable product (MVP) allows you to test your business idea fast and with minimal resources.


An MVP must contain the features that only makes your product functional, this way MVP can be built faster and idea can be tested early.


You can get the feature list by talking to the business focals, stakeholders, target audiance, users and so on.


Cover illustration credit: pikisuperstar - www.freepik.com
